name: Probed
description:
The year is 2XXX. The moons around the planet Abyss are shrouded in darkness and mystery. Countless explorers have been lost, but now it is your turn. Crash your probe into the moons of Abyss to earn money for upgrades. Then, when you’re ready, pilot your ship into the great beyond.

Controls: Your ship will automatically orient itself to point in the direction of your cursor. Use the spacebar or right click to fire the thrusters (be aware that you only have a limited amount of fuel, and the central planet has a strong gravitational pull). Visiting new bodies (by crashing into them) will generate money with which you can purchase upgrades for your ship. Use your mouse wheel to zoom in/out, click the middle mouse to pan, the R key to restart, and P to pause. Mute with M. Exit with Escape.

Goal: You will pilot your ship through the system until you either leave the system or crash. It’s possible to leave the system if you reach a distance of 500u from your starting point at a speed of 0.48 u/sec.
